attributes.action: Deny Human Rights For Those Who Take It From Others
attributes.additional_details:
Murders are consistantly declaring that their human rights are being breached when their punishments are declared.

Murderers should not be entitled to receive any Human Rights themselves, considering the fact that they ignore the Human Rights of other people (more specificly their victims & the victims families).

This petition is to request that any murderer, whether a British citizen or from abroad, be denied to declare that any punishment deemed fit by the justice system is in breach of their Human Rights.
